mainText:
Welcome to Bank of Entitlement! Where your every whim is our command, because you deserve it all!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, there I was at the fancy gala, ready to give my speech on the importance of yacht ownership in today's society. As I sauntered up to the podium, I noticed the lighting was all wrong-completely clashing with my designer suit. I stopped the event coordinator mid-sentence and demanded a complete redo of the lighting setup. Minutes later, as the lights dimmed and the spotlights shone on me just right, I dramatically exclaimed, "This is what I deserve!" The audience gasped in admiration, finally understanding the plight of the truly entitled. And when the coordinator timidly tried to apologize, I simply smirked and continued with my speech, basking in the glory of my entitlement. Ah, the sweet taste of superiority.
